mapper.select: SELECT EMI.* , EBI3.EBI_ID , EBI3.hvi_dt , EBI3.hvec , EBI3.hvoc , EBI3.hvcc , EBI3.hvncc , EBI3.hvccc , EBI3.hvicc , EBI3.hvgc , EBI3.hv2 , EBI3.hv3 , EBI3.hv4 , EBI3.hv5 , EBI3.hv6 , EBI3.hv7 , EBI3.hv8 , EBI3.hv9 , EBI3.hv10 , EBI3.hv11 , EBI3.hvct_yn , EBI3.hvmri_yn , EBI3.crt_by AS "EBI_CRT_BY" , EBI3.crt_dt AS "EBI_CRT_DT" , EBI3.mod_by AS "EBI_MOD_BY" , EBI3.mod_dt AS "EBI_MOD_DT" FROM (SELECT EBI2.* FROM ( SELECT EBI1.* , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY EBI1.HPID ORDER BY EBI1.HVI_DT DESC) AS RNUM FROM ER_BED_INFO EBI1) EBI2 WHERE EBI2.RNUM = 1) EBI3 INNER JOIN EMERGENCY_MEDICAL_INST_INFO EMI ON EBI3.HPID = EMI.HPID WHERE EMI.HPID = #{hpid}
